channel.title: Site Download limit :/
channel.description:
Ok i have a question,
is there a way to bypass a download limit that is based off of a account other than an ip address. i was wondering because this would save me 6$ a month lol, if you want a look at the site im talking about refer to [url=http://www.animenuke.com]here[/url]
thanks for your help =)
P.s. is there a way to trick a tracker into thinking your upload ratio is higher then it is? Like torrent wise.
